item.title: Version 6.1.4
item.description:
What's New in 6.1.4

‚ú® New Features

  • Command Palette: Press your preferred keyboard shortcut to instantly search tasks, start focus sessions, or create new tasks ‚Äî all from one place. Type natural durations like "30m", "1.5h", or "until 5pm" to set your focus time. Drag the palette anywhere on screen and it remembers where you left it.
  • Focus Mode Integration (Pro): Focusmo now automatically enables Do Not Disturb when you start a focus session. No more distractions from notifications. Toggle DND right from the floating timer bar.
  • Keyboard-First Task Management: Navigate your task list without touching the mouse ‚Äî J/K to move up and down, Enter to expand task details, C to create a new task, E to edit the selected task.
  • Expandable Task Details: Double-click any task to see the full picture ‚Äî time estimates, elapsed time, and when it was last modified.
  • Interactive Widgets: Complete tasks directly from your desktop widgets with a single tap.

üé® Improvements

  • Redesigned Bulk App Manager: The app blocking matrix now has freeze panes ‚Äî the app name column and header row stay visible as you scroll through large lists. The window is also resizable for better visibility.
  • Smoother Drag & Drop: Reordering tasks now feels premium with lift effects, subtle rotation, and smooth animations as tasks make room for each other.
  • Better Visual Feedback: Tasks now lift slightly on hover and show a clear focus ring when navigating with the keyboard.

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed drag & drop not working in some cases
  • Fixed tasks sometimes moving to the wrong position when reordering
  • Fixed tasks getting visually stuck after dragging
  • Fixed Daily Goal section missing from navigation
  • Fixed session pause/resume state getting out of sync

item.title: Version 6.1.3
item.description:
What's New in 6.1.3

‚ú® New Features

  • Task vs Session Clarity: New "Mark task as complete" toggle on the session completion screen. Now you can choose whether finishing a session also completes the task ‚Äî addressing confusion between session completion and task completion.

üé® Improvements

  • Remaining Time Display: Task list now shows "X left" suffix for tasks with remaining estimated time.
  • Celebration Window Focus: Session completion celebration now properly activates and comes to front.

üîÑ Changes

  • Cross-Device Sync: Temporarily disabled while mobile app development is in progress. Shows "Coming Soon" badge in Preferences.

item.title: Version 6.1.2
item.description:
• **Google Sign-In**: Sign in with your Google account to sync your data across devices and keep your progress backed up to the cloud. Your account info appears in Preferences.
  • **Redesigned Onboarding**: Completely new first-time experience guides you through setting daily focus goals, introduces the task manager, walks through setup steps, and helps you start your first focus session.
  • **Theme Selection**: New theme options in Preferences ‚Üí Appearance:
  • **Browser Activity Tracking**: Focusmo now tracks which websites you're visiting during focus sessions. Supports 15 browsers:
  • **Click-Through Mode for Floating Timer**: Enable in Preferences ‚Üí Appearance to make the floating timer transparent and click-through ‚Äî it stays visible but won't interfere with your work. Perfect for gaming or presentations.
  • **Quick Navigation to Activity**: Right-click any task and select "View in Activity" to instantly jump to that task's session history. The Activity screen scrolls to the right section and expands the task automatically.
  • **One-Click Accessibility Setup**: When Focusmo needs accessibility permissions, click the notification badge to open System Settings directly to the right page.
  • **Freemium Model Updates**:
  • **Activity Screen**: The "All Sessions" list is now available for weekly, monthly, and yearly views ‚Äî not just daily. See your complete session history regardless of time range.
  • **Faster Task Statistics**: Task time details now preload when you view tasks, so stats appear instantly without loading spinners.
  • **Smoother Animations**:
  • **Unified Design System**: Consistent colors, spacing, and typography throughout the app. All colors now respect your selected theme.
  • **Bundle ID Migration**: If you're upgrading from an older version, your settings, preferences, and iCloud data are automatically migrated to the new app identifier.
  • Fixed memory leaks in 9 timer-related components that could cause increased RAM usage over time
  • Fixed animation glitches caused by dynamic view identifiers
  • Fixed threading violations that could cause occasional UI freezes
  • Fixed crash safety by replacing fatalError calls with graceful error handling
  • Fixed menu bar widget showing incorrect version number
  • Fixed pulse animations stacking up and becoming too intense
  • Fixed iCloud sync issues for users with accessibility-restricted environments

item.title: Version 6.1.1
item.description:
What's New in 6.1.1

‚ú® New Features

  • Google Sign-In: Sign in with your Google account to sync your data across devices
  • Redesigned Onboarding: New guided setup for goals, task manager intro, and first focus session
  • Theme Selection: Choose Light/Dark/System appearance and Classic or Pastel color palettes
  • Browser Activity Tracking: Track websites during focus sessions across 15 browsers (Safari, Chrome, Firefox, Edge, Brave, Opera, Arc, Vivaldi, and more)
  • Click-Through Mode: Make floating timer transparent and non-interactive for gaming or presentations
  • View in Activity: Right-click any task to jump directly to its session history
  • One-Click Accessibility Setup: Click permission badge to open System Settings directly

üé® Improvements

  • Freemium Updates: Free users get all analytics views (3-day history) and Pomodoro presets
  • Activity Screen: All Sessions list now available for all time ranges
  • Faster Stats: Task statistics preload instantly
  • Smoother Animations: Improved wave animation and session list transitions
  • Unified Design: Consistent colors and typography throughout

üêõ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed memory leaks in timer components
  • Fixed animation glitches and UI freezes
  • Improved crash safety and error handling
  • Fixed menu bar widget version display
